courseDetails.title: The Ultimate Guide for Beginners in Photo Editing

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to “The ultimate guide for beginners in photo editing” course on Skylum’s Udemy Channel.


Designed for aspiring photographers and editing enthusiasts, this course is your gateway to the fascinating world of photo editing. Whether you're a complete novice or have some basic knowledge, this course will equip you with the essential skills to transform your photo into stunning works of art.


Throughout the course, you will gain a comprehensive theoretical background on editing, learning about its different stages, exploring the main existing software and applications, and discovering various editing styles. By the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of the editing process and be able to apply different techniques to enhance your photos.



THE COURSE WILL FOCUS ON 4 KEY AREAS:

In this section, you will learn the essential skills and concepts that form the foundation of photo editing. You will explore all the basic points of photo editing, main techniques, stages, and principles. The main ways your business can benefit from photo editing are also covered in this section.


Software for Editing Photos

This section will cover the main features and functions of Photoshop, Lightroom, Snapseed, and Picsart, thus helping you select the best option for your specific needs. In this section, we will also focus on Luminar Neo and tell you why it’s worth using if you want to level up your photo-editing skills.


Most Popular Photo-Editing Styles

In this section, we'll introduce you to the most popular photo-editing software programs and mobile apps. You'll learn how to choose the right tools for your needs, and we'll take a deep dive into the next level of photo editing with Luminar Neo.


Photo Editing Practice

Your chance to apply previously acquired photo-editing skills, as it contains some practical lessons on how to perform basic editing tasks, such as cropping, adjusting exposure, and so on. Separate lessons in this section focus on portrait and landscape editing.

courseDetails.title: Math Basics for School & College Students
courseDetails.shortDescription: Everyday Math | Arithmetic, Numbers, Decimal | Percentage, Ratio, Proportion | Power, Exponent, Roots | Factor, Patterns
courseDetails.longDescription:
Interested in Mathematics? Do you need extra help to build a solid math foundation before pursuing higher education in mathematics?

Our course is specifically designed for school and college students. This course will help you build a solid mathematical foundation for all your academic endeavours.

This Math Course explores how various number systems, such as binary and decimal, impact our digital world. You'll also learn how to compare entire numbers precisely and simply using the equal to (=), less than (<), and greater than (>) symbols for efficient mathematical comparisons.

In this basic math course, you'll master how to use percentages to uncover original amounts and efficiently calculate everything from sale discounts to tax obligations. Additionally, we'll demystify the concepts of PEMDAS and BODMAS, guiding you through precise calculation techniques step-by-step. Gain the confidence to handle complex mathematical operations with ease.

Moreover, you'll explore the critical math role of precise ratios in baking and cooking, ensuring consistently outstanding results in every dish. As we delve into the power of word formulations in daily life, you'll discover why metric measurements are key to success, whether you're in the lab or the kitchen. Learn how the SI system represents the universal language of measurement, equipping you with the tools for accuracy in every endeavour.

By learning the math formulae for calculating the area and perimeter of polygons with four sides, you will be able to utilise their practical applications in a variety of fields and appreciate their adaptability. As you learn about the world of three-dimensional forms and three-dimensional quadrilaterals, you will be able to calculate surface area and volume for real-world uses.

Additionally, this math course will illustrate the significance of powers of ten and the unique role of zero as an exponent. It will provide you with a foundational understanding crucial for solving problems in science and mathematics. You'll also learn how to determine the lowest common multiple swiftly. This is a key skill for simplifying fractions and tackling various mathematical challenges.


Enrol in our Foundation Diploma in Mathematics and embark on a journey of mathematical discovery. From arithmetic operations to geometric principles and real-world applications, this course equips you with indispensable skills for academic and professional success.


This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Foundations of Numbers: Delve into the basics of math by exploring various number systems, including whole numbers, fractions, and negatives. This section emphasizes practical arithmetic applications to strengthen your foundational math skills.

  2. Arithmetic Operations: Master core math operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. You'll focus on real-world applications, the order of operations, and improving calculator skills to enhance your math fluency.

  3. Decimals: Learn about the fundamentals of decimals, their power in approximation, and how math involving decimal division is crucial for accurate calculations in many real-world scenarios.

  4. Percentages: This section unveils the power of math ratios, the versatility of fractions, and the difference between percentages and points. You'll also analyze stock market trends to make wiser financial decisions.

  5. Ratios and Proportions: Understand the essence of math ratios in both part-to-part and part-to-whole comparisons. Calculate math formulas to determine ingredient proportions or measure lengths for everyday tasks.

  6. Measurements - Part 1: Learn about metric measurements and refine your estimates with math using reference objects. Gain fluency in the universal language of measurement by understanding the math principles behind the SI system.

  7. Measurements - Part 2: Discover how temperature impacts weather, cooking, and other activities in this math section on capacity and volume. You will also refine math skills for measuring length accurately in day-to-day tasks.

  8. Basic Geometry: Part 1: Explore the complexity of shapes and foundational math concepts like triangles, polygons, circumference, and radius. This part lays the groundwork for grasping geometric math ideas.

  9. Basic Geometry: Part 2: Study 3D math shapes, investigate cylinders, and examine the dimensions of irregular shapes in this math section on advanced geometry for practical applications.

  10. Powers and Exponents: Explore exponents' real-world math applications, investigate powers of ten, practice advanced math operations, and understand the significance of zero as an exponent.

  11. Root Operation: Master various math skills like estimating square roots, understanding cube numbers, and estimating cube roots quickly to excel in this section.

  12. Factors and Multiples: Simplify math fractions using the greatest common factor and prime factorization, compute the lowest common multiple, and determine the highest common factor for math efficiency.

  13. Everyday Patterns and Formulas: Examine Pascal's Triangle, math patterns, and practical formulas. Learn healthcare math formulas and essential business math strategies to master daily patterns.
targetAudiences: School students seeking a strong foundation in arithmetic and number theory, crucial for advanced mathematical studies.
College students who wish to solidify their understanding of basic math concepts or require a refresher on arithmetic principles.
Math graduates and educators looking for resources to assist in teaching foundational mathematics or to revisit core mathematical concepts.
Hobbyists and lifelong learners with an interest in math, wanting to enhance their numerical skills for personal development or professional applications.
Professionals in fields that require basic math skills, such as finance, engineering, or computer science, who seek to strengthen their mathematical background.
Parents or guardians looking to support their children’s learning in mathematics with effective and engaging teaching methods.

courseDetails.title: Migra un Sitio Web de WordPress a otro Dominio o Hosting
courseDetails.shortDescription: Migra un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting, sin saber de programación, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, podemos utilizar uno de estos dos plugins: All in One WP Migration o SiteGround Migrator.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.


¿QUÉ ME CALIFICA PARA ENSEÑARTE?

Mi nombre es Renato y soy el creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en el sector del marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), más de 80 MILLONES de reproducciones y miles de comentarios en mis tutoriales, tales como estos:

  • Muy buena las explicaciones en sus tutoriales, lo felicito. - Carlos Cabarcas

  • Excelente caballero muchas gracias por tan buen aporte. - Alexander Grayson

  • Muchas gracias, bien explicado y efectivamente muy ÚTIL.  - Dulce Rodríguez

  • Gracias por tu video fue muy sencillo el procedimiento y muy ùtil. - Verónica Trujillo


¡MI PROMESA PARA TI!

Soy un instructor en línea a tiempo completo. Estaré aquí para ti en cada paso del camino. Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

Quiero que este sea el mejor curso de CÓMO MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING que se encuentre en Internet. Entonces, si hay alguna manera de mejorar este curso, solo dígame y lo haré realidad.

Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation 2.0

Are you ready to revolutionize your approach to lead generation and business development? Welcome to the Master Course: Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation 2.0, where you'll unlock the secrets to mastering the art of cold calling in today's competitive business landscape.

courseDetails.title: Airbnb Business: How to be an Airbnb Entrepreneur
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to do Airbnb business, Airbnb automated, Airbnb rental arbitrage and be the best Airbnb entrepreneur in your area.
courseDetails.longDescription:
I started as an Airbnb entrepreneur in 2015.  My Airbnb business units have been through typhoons, earthquakes, a major pandemic and even a flood for good measure that wiped out one of the local train lines for 6 months.  In spite of this, we have through good property management ideas, consistently made a healthy profit.   How many businesses could you say this about and keep a straight face?  Airbnb hosting is a great side hustle or retirement income.   Running your own Airbnb business can also be your fulltime career should you wish to pursue it.   As well, in what other business can you meet other interesting people from all over the world. An  Airbnb business can take you into a career of property management, as well as being a career or side hustle on it's own.  It is really up to you, as to how far you want to take Airbnb.


I have experienced many things while hosting on Airbnb from Guests making false claims to fantastic guests you would want to see again and again.  From broken bones to broken tables.  I literally have seen and experienced it all.   You don`t have to learn on the job like I did.  You can learn from my experience.  We will also delve into Airbnb rental arbitrage.


This course will take you from a novice host to Super host status.  We will look at Airbnb clones, and Airbnb automation.  You will learn the basics so that you can get up and running and making money as soon as possible.   I have been hosting since 2015 and have had thousands of guests from literally everywhere.  Learn from my valuable experience about what to do and what not to do and how to handle the various situations that come up as an Airbnb host.  Learn also, why Airbnb is simply the best platform to host your short term rental property on.  We will explore Airbnb automated, and how to be the best Airbnb entrepreneur in your area.
targetAudiences: Beginners who do not even have an Airbnb account yet.

Learning web design and web design for small businesses is crucial not only for web designers and developers but also for entrepreneurs and company owners. Here's why:


Online Presence: In today's digital age, having a strong online presence is essential for businesses of all sizes. A well-designed website serves as the virtual storefront for a company, making it accessible to potential customers 24/7, regardless of geographical boundaries.


Credibility and Professionalism: A professionally designed website instills trust and credibility in the minds of consumers. It reflects positively on the business, conveying the message that the company is legitimate, established, and committed to providing quality products or services.


Brand Building: A website is an integral part of brand building. It provides an opportunity to showcase the brand's identity, values, and unique selling propositions. Consistent branding across the website helps reinforce brand recognition and loyalty among customers.


Marketing and Sales Tool: A well-designed website acts as a powerful marketing and sales tool. It allows businesses to reach a wider audience, engage with potential customers, and convert leads into sales. Through strategic design elements and user experience optimization, businesses can enhance their online visibility and attract more visitors.


Customer Engagement and Interaction: Websites offer a platform for businesses to engage with their audience and foster meaningful interactions. Features such as contact forms, live chat support, and social media integration enable seamless communication between businesses and customers, leading to improved satisfaction and loyalty.


Competitive Advantage: In today's competitive landscape, having a well-designed website can provide a competitive edge. A visually appealing and user-friendly website can set a business apart from its competitors, attracting more attention and driving conversion rates.


Analytics and Data-driven Decisions: With web design knowledge, entrepreneurs and business owners can leverage analytics tools to gather valuable insights into their website's performance. By analyzing metrics such as traffic, bounce rate, and conversion rates, they can make informed decisions to optimize their website for better results.


Cost-effectiveness: Learning web design empowers entrepreneurs and small business owners to create and manage their websites without relying on expensive external agencies or developers. This not only saves costs in the long run but also gives them greater control over their online presence.


Adaptability and Innovation: The digital landscape is constantly evolving, and having web design skills allows entrepreneurs to adapt to emerging trends and technologies. They can implement innovative features and design elements to stay ahead of the curve and meet the changing needs of their audience.


In conclusion, learning web design and understanding its importance for small businesses is essential for entrepreneurs and company owners to enhance their online presence, credibility, and ultimately, their business results. By investing in web design skills, they can create visually appealing, user-friendly websites that effectively engage customers and drive growth.

Short Description: Course will be interesting to anybody who want to acquire essential skills about Corporate management. This course will take practical examples to explain basic principles of corporate management and how it is important in  business. This will help in developing as a corporate person and become a better manager.


Management learning is critically important for both companies and individual managers, as it plays a pivotal role in achieving organizational success, fostering leadership skills, and advancing individual careers. Here's why management learning is significant for companies and managers:


For Companies:

Enhanced Productivity and Efficiency: Effective management practices help streamline workflows, allocate resources efficiently, and optimize processes. When managers are well-versed in management principles, companies can operate more productively, leading to cost savings and improved profitability.


Innovation and Adaptability: In a rapidly changing business environment, companies must continuously innovate and adapt. Management learning equips managers with the tools and knowledge to foster a culture of innovation and navigate through evolving market conditions.


Employee Engagement and Retention: Skilled managers can create a positive work environment, motivate employees, and build strong teams. This leads to higher employee engagement and lower turnover rates, reducing recruitment and training costs for the company.


Strategic Decision-Making: Management education provides managers with the ability to make informed, data-driven decisions. Strategic thinking and decision-making skills are essential for achieving long-term business goals.


Conflict Resolution and Communication: Effective communication and conflict resolution are vital in any organization. Managers with management training are better equipped to handle conflicts, promote teamwork, and maintain a harmonious workplace.


Risk Management: Companies face various risks, from financial to operational and reputational. Management learning helps managers identify, assess, and mitigate these risks, ensuring the company's stability and sustainability.


Customer Satisfaction: Managers with a deep understanding of management principles are more likely to focus on customer needs and satisfaction. This customer-centric approach can lead to increased loyalty and revenue.


For Managers:

Career Advancement: Management learning is crucial for career growth. Employers often prioritize candidates with management education and experience when filling leadership positions.


Leadership Development: Management education enhances leadership skills, including decision-making, problem-solving, and team management. These skills are transferable and valuable throughout one's career.


Increased Confidence: Managers who undergo management training gain confidence in their abilities. This confidence translates into better leadership and a greater capacity to handle challenging situations.


Networking Opportunities: Management courses and programs often facilitate networking with peers and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new opportunities and insights.


Personal Growth: Management learning is not only about career advancement but also personal growth. It encourages self-reflection, self-improvement, and a better understanding of one's strengths and weaknesses.


Adaptation to Change: In today's dynamic business world, the ability to adapt to change is essential. Management education equips managers with the skills to thrive in uncertain and evolving environments.


Job Satisfaction: Effective management leads to more successful teams and projects, which can result in greater job satisfaction for managers. A fulfilling career is often linked to the ability to manage and lead effectively.


In conclusion, management learning is vital for both companies and managers. It empowers organizations to operate efficiently, innovate, and achieve their goals while providing managers with the tools and knowledge needed for career growth, personal development, and effective leadership. A strong foundation in management principles benefits everyone involved and contributes to long-term success.
targetAudiences: Professionals with any background who wants to upgrade management skills

courseDetails.title: Ethical Hacking: Crypto 101
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understand Crypto, essential for Ethical Hackers
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this course you will learn about basic crypto for ethical hackers. You will learn about hashing, how to crack windows password hashes, how to crack linux hashes and about cryptography. Hashing is a process of converting a given input into a fixed-size alphanumeric string. The output of a hash function is often referred to as a message digest or simply, a hash. A good hash function satisfies the following properties: it is easy to compute the hash value for any given message, it is infeasible to generate two different messages that result in the same hash value, it is infeasible to modify a message without changing its hash value, and it is infeasible to determine the original message from its hash value.

When used properly, hashing can be an effective way to store sensitive data such as passwords while keeping them safe from prying eyes. This is because even if someone were to obtain the hash value of a password, they would still need to brute force guess the actual password which would be incredibly time consuming (if not impossible) with today's computing power.

After completing this course, you will be able to crack the passwords hashes from a Windows and Linux computer and find all users passwords using hash cracking tools. You will also be able to verify data integrity and understand basic crypto.

courseDetails.title: CyberSecurity Bootcamp: The Ultimate Beginner's Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Knowledge that everyone must have. Learn how to protect your personal data from hackers. Take cyber security seriously.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you know what is the biggest threat in Cyber Security? The humans, it is so obvious. It’s all of us. The majority of security britches are actually being driven through social engineering and human interaction. Because we individually and collectively, just not taking cybersecurity seriously. We don’t know how to prevent the risks, the threats and vulnerabilities that exist in our behaviors and habits. We don’t have enough knowledge and training. We don’t teach ourselves to behave correctly when we use computers and electronic devices.

We must be aware of the correct simple things we need to do. Like best practices and general cybersecurity simple rules. And when we don’t do this, we open our doors widely for unauthorized access to our personal information to anyone. If we just know how to not do silly things and do things that can lead to compromise. We are all going to be more secure.

This is what our course is all about. We will show how easy it is to follow just a few simple cybersecurity practices. That will keep your personal information safe from unauthorized access and will keep you away from troubles.

The purpose of this course is to help you understand how to protect the personal data you have recorded on your computers, laptops and mobile devices. You will understand what the best practices are. How simple it is to secure your devices. And how this can prevent attacks and make your devices more secure.

You will learn what Social Engineering is and how the hackers are using it. Why must you keep your software always updated. What is the advantage of using strong passwords and password managers? You will understand why it’s important to enable 2FA/MFA for all your accounts. Also, what is device encryption, why you need it and how it protects you. Why you should avoid using public Wi-Fi and how VPN can protect you.

Why you must use antivirus software, from what attacks it can protect you. How to be cautious and how to prevent data breaches of your personal data and identity.

We will explain you what Malware is and its types:

- Trojan Horse

- Adware

- Spyware

- Browser Hijacking

- Virus

- Worms

- Scareware

You will learn how to recognize phishing emails, how to browse safely, and communicate securely.

At the end of the course you will know how to protect your electronic devices. You know the meaning of the main cybersecurity threats and terminology and how to recognize them.

We have created a course for everyone who uses some kind of electronic device, uses the internet and wants to protect his personal data or learn more about the Cybersecurity threat.

The terminology is simply explained with interactive professional videos and examples.

Don’t wait, take this course and educate yourself. Educating yourself and others — is by far the most effective defense you can do against all faces of Cyber Attacks.

Start your Security Awareness training now. Take Cyber Security seriously.
targetAudiences: Everyone who is using electronic devices like computers, laptops and mobile phones.
Everyone who wants to know how to protect his personal data.

Computing Fundamentals: OS, Network, Virtualization, and Cloud Computing is an introductory course that provides learners with a comprehensive understanding of the basics of modern computing systems.  Learners will gain a deep understanding of the critical concepts and skills necessary to navigate the digital landscape.


The course begins with an overview of operating systems, including the different types of operating systems, how they function, and how they manage computer resources.


Next, the course covers computer networking, including the principles of computer networking, and how data is transmitted across networks. You will learn about the different types of networks, including local area networks (LANs), wide area networks (WANs), and the internet.


The course then covers virtualization, including the different types of virtualization, how virtualization is used to optimize IT infrastructure, and how to set up and manage virtual machines. You will learn how virtualization can reduce costs, increase efficiency, and simplify IT management.


By the end of the course, you will have a solid foundation in the fundamentals of modern computing systems, including operating systems, networks, virtualization, and IT networking. You can confidently navigate the digital landscape and understand the basics of IT networking. Whether you're new to the field of computing or seeking to refresh your knowledge, this course provides a comprehensive overview of the essentials of modern computing systems.

courseDetails.title: Basics of Pricing (Arabic) سلسلة التسويق: أساسيات التسعير
courseDetails.shortDescription: التسعير شديد الأهمية في إدارة التسويق، وفي ريادة الأعمال، كيف تتجنب أخطاء التسعير؟  - خطوات تطبيقية مركزة - د.ايهاب مسلم
courseDetails.longDescription:
التسعير من أهم المهام التسويقيةوهو المكون الثاني للمزيج التسويقي: المنتج – السعر – المكان – الترويج

السعر الخاطئ يتسبب في ضياع أربح على الشركة، سواء كان أعلى من اللازم أو أقل
ولذلك فهو قرار شديد الحساسية ويؤثر بشكل مباشر في ربحية الشركة

يناقش الكورس عدة محاور عن التسعير ليقدم للدارس فكرة شاملة عن خطوات ومبادئ الوصل لسعر صحيح يحقق قيمة ومنفعة للعميل، ويحقق أرباح للشركة في نفس الوقت

الموضوعات التى يغطيها الكورس هى:

أخطاء التسعير مكلفة
كيف تتجنب أخطاء التسعير؟

ماهى خطوات التسعير المهمة

استراتيجيات التسعير: هل منتجات مثل ساعات رولكس وسيارات لامبورجيني تعتمد على التكلفة في وضع أسعارها أم ان الاستراتيجية شئ آخر؟

كيف نحسب التكلفة: التكلفة لها عدة مكونات، ويجب أخذها جميعا في الاعتبار، سنتعرف على التكلفة المباشرة وغير المباشرة وكذلك التكلفة الثابتة والمتغيرة، وسنتعرف على نقطة التعادل للمنتجات.

دراسة أسعار المنافسين: وهي خطوة مهمة قبل تحديد السعر، هل سيكون مع متوسط أسعار المنافسين أم أعلى أم أقل؟وكيف نتعرف على متسوط الأسعار في السوق؟

علاقة السعر بالعرض والطلب: قد يتحكم السوق تماما في السعر ون تدخل منا.. متى يكون ذلك؟

الجانب النفسي للسعر: وهو مؤثر جدا في قرار الشراء. ماهو تأثير وجود رقم 9 في السعر؟ وما تأثير حجم كتابة السعر؟ وكيف يكون السعر اكثر اقناعا؟

التسعير حسب الشريحة: هل يمكن بيع منتج واحد، أو نفس الخدمة بعدة أسعار؟ ومتى يكون ذلك صحيحا؟

التسعير حسب الموقع الجغرافي: هل الموقع له علاقة بالسعر؟

التسعير للتجارة الدولية: مصطلحات ال incoterms مهمة للمصدرين والمستوردين

الخصومات والعروض: ما هي أنواع الخصومات؟ وما تأثيرها على نجاح سياسات التسعير؟

تعديل الأسعار برفعها اوتخفيضها: متى نرفع السعر ومتى نخفضه؟

تسعير مزيج المنتجات: علاقة أسعار المنتجات ببعضها البعض

الاتجاهات الحديثة فى التسعير

courseDetails.title: Crafting Impactful English  Presentations in only 7 Days.
courseDetails.shortDescription: "Mastering Public Speaking: A Practical, Hands-On, and Proven 7-Day Presentation Bootcamp – The Ultimate Course
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the "7 Days English Presentation Bootcamp for Marketing Professionals"!


I'm Inge, your dedicated coach with over five years of experience working closely with sales and marketing professionals like yourself. Having personally guided over 3,000 individuals in both one-on-one sessions and group classes, I am excited to embark on this transformative journey to elevate your public speaking abilities.


Now, let's explore the exciting details of our 7-day challenge! Each day is crafted to enhance specific aspects of public speaking, empowering you to build confidence and deliver impactful presentations:


Day 1: Building a Strong Foundation for Public Speaking Success Lay the groundwork for your journey by focusing on posture, breathing techniques, and fundamental principles.

Day 2: Crafting a Compelling Message Learn the art of creating a powerful and persuasive message that resonates with your audience, leaving a lasting impact.

Day 3: Engaging Your Audience Discover techniques to keep your audience captivated and actively involved throughout your presentation.

Day 4: Mastering Body Language and Voice Understand the importance of confident body language and voice modulation in effectively conveying your message.

Day 5: Using Visual Aids to Enhance Your Presentation Harness the power of visual aids to visually enhance and support your speech.

Welcome!

Hello everyone, and welcome to the course that will help you prepare for your coding interviews!

We will learn how to approach problems of all kinds, such as those consisting of Arrays, Strings, Linked Lists, Trees, Dynamic Programming, Design, Math, and general knowledge, while also learning useful concepts and tricks which will help when facing more difficult problems.


What is LeetCode?

Simply put, LeetCode is a large repository filled with interview questions asked by the top tech companies around the world (Google, Facebook, Amazon, and many more).

The main problem as a new user on LeetCode is that there are ENDLESS amounts of questions that you can find on there so you may not know which questions are the most common/beneficial to go over. This course's purpose is to provide a solution to this issue, as I go over the Top Inteview Questions recommended by LeetCode. If you are looking to ace your upcoming coding interview or even just to strengthen your problem solving skills, then look no further as you have found the one-stop-shop to become a problem solving machine.

Course Overview

For each problem in the playlist, I have a video dedicated to explaining the thought process in detail which will lead us to the most efficient solution, paired with a visual to aid in explaining the algorithm. After we understand the approach for the most efficient solution, I will translate the visual into Java code, breaking down every line as I code it. After the entire solution is implemented, we will analyze the time and space complexity of the solution.
targetAudiences: Developers looking to solidify their problem solving skills and ace their coding interviews

courseDetails.title: Open-Source Intelligence (OSINT)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Secrets of OSINT
courseDetails.longDescription:
Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) is the art of researching via publicly available sources and then creating a report, which can be used for any number of applications. This can include, but is not limited to: Law Enforcement, Government and Military, Corporate Security or any other field that utilizes information. The information can come from anywhere on the internet. OSINT data can then be used to give support and credence to an investigation.


It is important to note that all data in OSINT is collected and/or saved, therefore leaving a digital footprint. The report created may have information, which addresses personal details of an individual or business, who may not have consented to such publication. Those researching for personal reasons; law enforcement, private investigators, etc., must be mindful of this before utilizing this method of information research/gathering.


In this course you will learn many OSINT techniques like collecting email addresses of companies, finding geo location information in images, searching by image, google dorking and much more. While some of the skills are more technical, you don't need to be a computer expert or advanced hacker to do this course. This is a beginners course that doesn't have any prior requirements. If you want to learn about Open Source Intelligence (OSINT), this course is for you.
targetAudiences: Anyone that wants to learn OSINT, hackers, security professionals, investigators, people interested in security.
